page.title: 17Leisure time, Kesgrave
page.content: In my spare time I ride my bike, play with a ball, play tennis, read, write or draw pictures. I play with my marbles and my dolls, or with my cassette recorder, or I play games like Guess Who', 'Scrabble' or Â£Chinese Checkers'. Sometimes I sing songs or play noughts and crosses. I also go swimming, play in my back garden or call for my friends and ask if they are allowed to play. Then we do running and gymnastics and my sister gives me points. I sometimes play with my sister's Â£play dough' but mostly I do sports activities or I read books. At school I play games, Â£It' or Â£Eggy Peggy' or Â£Stick in the Mud'. I play with my friends in the play- ground and I think it is fun.
